title.0: Which actor will win the 2025 Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Male TV Star (Family)?

question_description.0: Deadline: [Ariana Grande, Lady Gaga, Kendrick Lamar & Selena Gomez Lead 2025 Nickelodeon Kids’ Choice Awards Nominees; Tyla To Host](https://deadline.com/2025/05/kids-choice-awards-nominations-ariana-grande-lady-gaga-1236398184/)

question_resolution_criteria.0: This question resolves as the winner of Nickelodeon's [2025 Kids' Choice Award](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2025_Kids%27_Choice_Awards) for Favorite Male TV Star (Family).

question_options.0: ['Damon Wayans Jr.', 'David Schwimmer', 'George Lopez', 'Jude Law', 'Sam McCarthy', 'Xolo Mariduena']
